overview: I am an actress who plays Martha, the main character of the play 'The Misunderstanding'. Even in my daily life, I constantly draw back Martha's lines and portray her. Following her feelings, I go to the sea that she craved and find a desert that resembles her. I feel her footsteps as I pass through the sea and the sun, the devastated desert and the burnt-out warehouse, where I meet her.
title: Monologue
